title: Beach Party Aurelion Sol [Skin Concept]
body:
I liked this idea, so I made concept art for it:
[https://i.imgur.com/V2Qu75Q.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/V2Qu75Q.jpg)

His orbiting stars are now sea weed, cause nobody likes to be hit by sea weed, eugh. Or, they could be water, or beach balls!
It could go nicely with the upcoming Pool party Zoe skin.
[https://i.imgur.com/BHDNLIf.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/BHDNLIf.jpg)

Plus who doesn't want an ivern skin at this point?

I don't think pool party works for things that aren't reasonably humanoid. 

But if you must, his orbs should be beach balls and I think he would look better if you turned his body into some kind of seahorse or something.  A yellow A Sol dragon just doesn't quite hit the mark for me. 

He would be better suited to a deep terror line or something. He could easily be turned into some kind of sea creature/monster.
But then you don't have a lighthearted theme skin if you do that.
There's Beach Party reksai...

> [{quoted}](name=DreamConsumerist,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=QRXBu6b9,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2018-06-07T07:02:48.313+0000)
>
> There's Beach Party reksai...

Yes, but what did they do to rek sai? They altered her to look more like a shark. 

If you want pool party A Sol to work I think you need to change his model to look more like a sea creature of some sort. Just changing his color doesn't cut it. If they arent a humanoid then they need to look like they belong in the water. A sea horse was the first thing that came to my mind based on his posture. 

A ghost tail also doesnt make sense on a water creature because hes no longer an ethereal cosmic creature. So perhaps this is a good oportunity to just chop off his ghost half entirely and make him an upright seahorse with less overall tail length so there is no need to make half of him ghosted as a sign that its not a part of his hitbox. The new seahorse model would simply fit within the confines of his actual hitbox.
